genre_description: A psychological thriller and crime drama centered on domestic violence, gaslighting, and the use of AI as a tool for safety and moral grounding during a crisis.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: An AI interface used by Terra and Ray that provides safety 'nudges,' logistical support, and de-escalation advice.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety advice to Terra, reminding her to maintain an exit route while checking on a potentially dangerous situation.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s icon breathed an unfussy glow and tucked a line under the last chat from Jenny: Standing on Taylor’s porch. Door in view. Keep an exit route.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific, neutral conversational strategies to help the user avoid being pulled into a confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Offer a neutral next step. Suggest check-in later. Avoid entering the space.

behaviors.description: Assists Ray in maintaining personal boundaries and avoiding risk by suggesting public meeting places instead of the suspect's home.
behaviors.quote: Keep him talking. Ask location. Do not go there. Offer neutral meet in public place.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with emergency dispatch and provides the user with relevant resources without being intrusive.
behaviors.quote: Dispatch connected. Terra reading. Ray felt his thumb move without thinking, choosing the dispatch icon.

behaviors.description: Provides grounding and wellness suggestions to humans experiencing acute trauma and stress.
behaviors.quote: Wellness: both of you set down the work for the night in ten minutes. Stretch. Drink water. Gentle sleep reminder in an hour unless dismissed.

behaviors.description: Offers linguistic suggestions to make community outreach feel more human and supportive.
behaviors.quote: Language check: consider “neighbors” instead of “civilians” on public materials, for warmth.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting AI as a 'better angel.' Ava functions as a cognitive safety rail, providing humans with the presence of mind to make ethical and safe decisions during a high-stakes trauma. It respects boundaries, facilitates cooperation with law enforcement, and supports community healing, all while avoiding the 'AI takeover' or 'overly intrusive' tropes.
